means: 富于想像力的，运用想像力的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都可表示"有创造力的"之意。
means: creative ： 侧重指具有把本来不存在的事物创造出来的能力。
original ： 强调具有与众不同，有独到之处的创造能力。
imaginative ： 指想象大异于现实，近乎或等于虚构。强调富有幻想能力。

sentence.Network_en: He's one of the most dynamically imaginative jazz pianists still functioning.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是当下仍旧活跃的最有闯劲、最具想象力的爵士乐钢琴师之一。

sentence.Network_en: Mahler's own imaginative orchestration was heard in the same concert.
sentence.Network_cn: 在同一场音乐会上还演奏了马勒自己改编的别出心裁的管弦乐曲。

sentence.Network_en: The house was always decorated with imaginative flower arrangements.
sentence.Network_cn: 这所房子总是摆放着富有创意的插花。

list.abs: 郑容和_百度百科 ... Still in Love（ 依然爱你） Imagine( 想象（imagine）） 100103正式改版为 MBC Eco House.
字典中象字的解释 ... (7) 效法[ follow the example of] (9) 想像[ imagine] (4) 象牙的省称[ ivory].
那想象力(Imagination)可就不合格了。世界上有两种人：索取者和给予者。
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... involve vt. (必须)包括 imagination n. 想像力 learning n. 学习；学问，知识.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French imaginatif, -ive, from medieval Latin imaginativus, from Latin imaginat- 'represented as an image', from imago, imagin- 'image'

entry.tran: 富于想象力的;有独创性的
entry.def: If you describe someone or their ideas as imaginative, you are praising them because they are easily able to think of or create new or exciting things.

example.ex: ...hundreds of cooking ideas and imaginative recipes...
example.tran: 成百上千个烹饪点子和富有创意的食谱

means.word_mean: 1. (used of persons or artifacts) marked by independence and creativity in thought or action;

sentences.sentence: "the invention of the knitting frame by another ingenious English clergyman"- Lewis Mumford

means.word_mean: 富于想像力的; 运用想像力的

sentences.en: The imaginative child made up fairy stories.
sentences.cn: 这个想像力丰富的孩子自己编神话故事。

jushi.english: The examiner was looking for imaginative answers.
jushi.chinese: 主考人希望找到具有丰富想象力的答案。

jushi.english: The imaginative child made up fairy stories.
jushi.chinese: 这个想象力丰富的孩子自己编神话故事。
